--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Stop playing council member, LN... If something isn't in her bio it 
> doens't mean that her character didn't have it with her. 
> 
> 
> On 19 Jul 2001, at 20:23, Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> 
> > OOC: Airly.. I will accept that absorbing thing however as for 
using
> > it to better herself I will ignore that since that entire energy
> > absorbing and bettering thing is not listed anywhere in
> > Blacknightmares bio. Which I just looked at, and if it suddenly
> > "appeared" there I would be very suspicious of it. Also note that
> > energy from sparks doesnt act like normal energy. Since 
Blacknightmare
> > isnt a creation of the Bamphomet and the energy is specifically
> > created to be used solely by those he creates it would have a 
very bad
> > negative effect on blacknightmare if she absorbed it and/or tried 
to
> > use it to improve anything. I will not reply until you have 
replied to
> > this. 
> >

chasing

use it

didn't

energy.
